{"rule":"TOO_LONG_SENTENCE","sentence":"^\\QBeing analogous to deep learning (connectionism), gender construct is a training set that contains two classes: Class 0 (female) is consisted of feminine faces, vaginas, clitorises, developed breasts, pink, purple, brooms, mops, kitchens, dolls, stuffed toys, dresses, Mary Jane shoes, jewellery, make-up On the contrary, class 1 (male) is made up of masculine faces, penises, testicles, undeveloped breasts, Adam's apples, beards, blue, computers, documents, architecture, toy cars, pants, suits, ties An individual's gender identity is the product of it.\\E$"}
